description: Updates read and write permissions on a dashboard.

parameters.name: AwsAccountId
parameters.description: The ID of the Amazon Web Services account that contains the dashboard whose permissions you're updating.

parameters.name: GrantPermissions
parameters.description: The permissions that you want to grant on this resource. (dict) --- Permission for the resource. The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the principal. This can be one of the following: The ARN of an Amazon QuickSight user or group associated with a data source or dataset. (This is common.) The ARN of an Amazon QuickSight user, group, or namespace associated with an analysis, dashboard, template, or theme. (This is common.) The ARN of an Amazon Web Services account root: This is an IAM ARN rather than a QuickSight ARN. Use this option only to share resources (templates) across Amazon Web Services accounts. (This is less common.) The IAM action to grant or revoke permissions on. (string) ---

nested_params.name: Principal
nested_params.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the principal. This can be one of the following:

nested_params.name: Actions
nested_params.description: The IAM action to grant or revoke permissions on.

parameters.name: RevokePermissions
parameters.description: The permissions that you want to revoke from this resource. (dict) --- Permission for the resource. The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the principal. This can be one of the following: The ARN of an Amazon QuickSight user or group associated with a data source or dataset. (This is common.) The ARN of an Amazon QuickSight user, group, or namespace associated with an analysis, dashboard, template, or theme. (This is common.) The ARN of an Amazon Web Services account root: This is an IAM ARN rather than a QuickSight ARN. Use this option only to share resources (templates) across Amazon Web Services accounts. (This is less common.) The IAM action to grant or revoke permissions on. (string) ---

nested_params.name: Principal
nested_params.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the principal. This can be one of the following:

nested_params.name: Actions
nested_params.description: The IAM action to grant or revoke permissions on.

parameters.name: GrantLinkPermissions

This can be one of the following: The ARN of an Amazon QuickSight user or group associated with a data source or dataset. (This is common.) The ARN of an Amazon QuickSight user, group, or namespace associated with an analysis, dashboard, template, or theme. (This is common.) The ARN of an Amazon Web Services account root: This is an IAM ARN rather than a QuickSight ARN. Use this option only to share resources (templates) across Amazon Web Services accounts. (This is less common.) The IAM action to grant or revoke permissions on. (string) ---

nested_params.name: Principal
nested_params.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the principal. This can be one of the following:

nested_params.name: Actions
nested_params.description: The IAM action to grant or revoke permissions on.

parameters.name: RevokeLinkPermissions
parameters.description: Revokes link permissions from all users in a defined namespace. (dict) --- Permission for the resource. The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the principal. This can be one of the following: The ARN of an Amazon QuickSight user or group associated with a data source or dataset. (This is common.) The ARN of an Amazon QuickSight user, group, or namespace associated with an analysis, dashboard, template, or theme. (This is common.) The ARN of an Amazon Web Services account root: This is an IAM ARN rather than a QuickSight ARN. Use this option only to share resources (templates) across Amazon Web Services accounts. (This is less common.) The IAM action to grant or revoke permissions on. (string) ---

nested_items.name: DashboardArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the dashboard.

nested_items.name: Permissions
nested_items.description: Information about the permissions on the dashboard.

nested_items.name: Principal
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the principal. This can be one of the following:
The ARN of an Amazon QuickSight user or group associated with a data source or dataset. (This is common.)
The ARN of an Amazon QuickSight user, group, or namespace associated with an analysis, dashboard, template, or theme. (This is common.)

The ARN of an Amazon Web Services account root: This is an IAM ARN rather than a QuickSight ARN. Use this option only to share resources (templates) across Amazon Web Services accounts. (This is less common.)

nested_items.name: Actions
nested_items.description: The IAM action to grant or revoke permissions on.

nested_items.name: RequestId
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services request ID for this operation.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The HTTP status of the request.

nested_items.name: LinkSharingConfiguration
nested_items.description: Updates the permissions of a shared link to an Amazon QuickSight dashboard.

nested_items.name: Permissions
nested_items.description: A structure that contains the permissions of a shareable link.

nested_items.name: Principal
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the principal. This can be one of the following:
The ARN of an Amazon QuickSight user or group associated with a data source or dataset. (This is common.)
The ARN of an Amazon QuickSight user, group, or namespace associated with an analysis, dashboard, template, or theme. (This is common.)

The ARN of an Amazon Web Services account root: This is an IAM ARN rather than a QuickSight ARN. Use this option only to share resources (templates) across Amazon Web Services accounts. (This is less common.)

nested_items.name: Actions
nested_items.description: The IAM action to grant or revoke permissions on.
